CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Drop a totem to the East and kill 8 of the Lodestone &/or Energized Geodes near it\n\nPress continue when objective is complete

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Get on the flying Alliance Airship

Turn in the quest & do *all* quests on the boat

 Sorry, but HB hasn't meshed the boat yet - I recommend pushing stop bot & using combatbot until you're done!
The rope is on the deck, alcohol on 1st below, ogre on 2nd below

Once you have Return to the Temple of Earth - get off the boat and press start / continue

TurnIn.QuestName: On Second Thought, Take One Prisoner

PickUp.QuestName: Return to the Temple of Earth

TurnIn.QuestName: Return to the Temple of Earth

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: help the 4 dorfs standing on green rune's kill their adds, then give them the rock\n\nPress continue when objectives are complete

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Speak with Peak Grindstone and escort the catapult until objective is completed\n\nThen turn in and get next quest - you have to jump on a catapult "Bombard 30 reinforcements"

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: You have to jump on a catapult "Bombard 30 reinforcements"\n\nPress continue once you're done and are out of the vehicle

PickUp.QuestName: The Very Earth Beneath Our Feet

TurnIn.QuestName: The Very Earth Beneath Our Feet

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Go up to a Servant of Therzane and use the hook, then move away to trip him. Kill 3

Complete the Crumling Defenses quest - find the 3 npc's and help them kill their adds. They hav V's on top of their heads

Press continue after both are finished

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Find the 3 npc's and help them kill their adds. They hav V's on top of their heads\n\nPress continue after it's finished

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Run around the block w/o getting eaten by the worm - use your ground mount

Press continue when you've cleared the big worm

Don't go far, you have to run back in a min

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Run around the block w/o getting eaten by the worm - use your ground mount\n\nPress continue when you've cleared the big worm

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Jump up the rocks and kill the dragon\n\nPress continue when you're back on the ground

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Take your Wind-devil around to a red mist and stand in it until objective is completed\n\nPress continue when objective is completed

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text:
Kill Zoltrik, you have to engage him, dps him a little and then he runs like a sissy and you have to jump onto his drake and kill him

Once you've killed him, press continue and i'll fly you back

If your toon is weak, I would watch the next elite kills

Don't go far, you may have to assist in killing High Priestess Lorthuna in a few more quests

CustomBehavior.Title: title
CustomBehavior.Text: Deepholm is completed. Glop is left (Wrath of the Fungalmancer) and 5 dailies at Therazane. There are 2 quests to Stonecore if you want to pick them up - Stormcaller Mylra and Therazane each have 1\n\nGo to SW / Org and turn in "That's No Pyramid!" once you want to go to Uldum
